#using

= Using=

All scripts generate code of asterisk .conf files

Using 'users':
* Copy script to /etc/asterisk/users.pl
* Edit /etc/asterisk/users.pl and check parameters in head of script.
* Try run scrip on shell and check output of script. It is look like users.conf style.
* Edit asterisk 'users.conf' file. Add line:
#exec /etc/asteris/user.pl
* Enjoy!
